short_summary: Notice of proposed procurement for aerial delivery system
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested to CAAWC Trenton by December 2023. Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.
full_summary:
# Net, Cargo, Aerial Delivery

## Notice of Tender

### Project Title:
Net, Cargo, Aerial Delivery

### Reference Number:
cb-9077-62789089

### Publication Date:
14 September 2023

### Closing Date:
17 October 2023 at 14:00

**Note:** Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, the bidder is strongly encouraged to transmit their bid electronically using the epost Connect service instead of traditional bid delivery methods.

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the following items to be delivered to Canadian Air and Space Museum within December 2023:

* Item 1: Net, Cargo, Aerial Delivery (GSIN: 1670, NSN: 99-138-1944)
	+ Quantity: 10 EA
	+ Unit of Issue: Units

Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name, model, and/or part number, in addition to the National CAD Standard (NCS) designation.

## Procurement Details
* Contracting Entity: National Defence
* Contracting Entity Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, ON K1K 0K2, Canada
* Contact Information:
	+ Name: Audree Poissant-Viau
	+ Email: audree.poissant-viau@forces.gc.ca
	+ Phone: 00
	+ Fax: None
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* Regions of Opportunity: World
* Regions of Delivery: Ontario (except NCR)
* Contract Start Date: 15 December 2023
* Contract End Date: 31 March 2024

### Documents
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. The following documents are attached:

* [w8485-247729.a -- bid-solicitation-(en-canada-buys.pdf)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9077/w8485-247729.a---bid-solicitation-%28en-canada-buys.pdf)
* [w8485-247729 --- adm-001 --(en.pdf)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/11959/w8485-247729---adm-001-%28en.pdf)

Note to supplier: Due to the reduced business hours and limited staff availability
